channel.title: [PI] Everything is in Three's! [PI]
channel.description: Hello one day I did an update and I cannot remember what it was :palm: this is what happens tho ::item 391 1 gives 3 manta ray ::givespins 1 PLAYERNAME gives 3 spins instead of one anyone know what the problem is my commands exceeds the limit of characters so I cant paste those in did this happen to anyone else and found out how to fix it if so please help! I'll Greatly Appreciate it!

@i_call_dueces wrote:

item.title: [PI] Everything is in Three's! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @i_call_dueces i call dueces
item.description:
@i_call_dueces wrote:

can you please post your code?
edit: just found it. should put that link in the first post, so its easy to find.
ill update this message in a sec

edit2: well, first, find out where your problem is.
is the command being triggered 3 times?
im guessing if anything, you probably need ‘else if’ statements for

[code] if (c.playerRights >= 0)
playerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3)
moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 3)
administratorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 3 || c.playerRights == 2)
ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 3)
ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 3)
ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.isDonator == 1)
DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);

}[/code]

since you have

if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 3) administratorCommands(c, playerCommand); if (c.playerRights == 3 || c.playerRights == 2) ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);

if you were to playerRights 3, its gonna trigger mod commands, admin commands AND owner commands.

basically, itll read it like this

‘is he rank 1,2 or 3? okay, trigger this (moderatorCommands)’
‘now check if he’s 2, 1 or 3. if he is, trigger administratorCommands’
'NOW check if playerRights = 2 or 3. if so, trigger ownerCommands

if you had ‘else if’ statements, it’ll pick one and move onto the rest of the code.
also, might wanna fix restrictions, so you dont have moderators doing admin commands. if you read it, you can see the first and second if statements are the same, so if you were to take one of those if statements outs and put brackets where needed, it would look like this

if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3) { moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand); administratorCommands(c, playerCommand); } if (c.playerRights == 3 || c.playerRights == 2) ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);

CORRECT CODE WOULD BE:

if(c.playerRights == 1) { moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand); } else if(c.playerRights == 2) { administratorCommands(c, playerCommand); } else if(c.playerRights == 3 || c.playerRights >=3) { ownerCommands(c, playerCommand); }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Everything is in Three's! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Heres your problem m8…

[code] public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize)
{
String playerCommand = c.getInStream().readString();
if (!playerCommand.startsWith("/"))
{
c.getPA().writeCommandLog(playerCommand);
}
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“report”) && playerCommand.length() > 7) {
try {
BufferedWriter report = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./Data/Reports.txt", true));
String Report = playerCommand.substring(7);
try {
report.newLine();
report.write(c.playerName + “: " + Report);
c.sendMessage(“You have successfully submitted your report.”);
} finally {
report.close();
}
} catch (IOException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}
…
…
…
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“rank”) && c.sit == false) {
if(c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“Er, it’s not to smart to do this in the Wilderness.”);
return;
}
c.sit = false;
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“irng4u”)) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I’m The Biggest Fag In The World!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“You’re A FUCKING FAGG, Sajid! <3 Alex!”);
}
if(c.playerRights == 0) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I’m A N3WB!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“N3WB”);
}
if(c.playerRights == 2) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “Don’t Fuck With Me!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“Administrator”);
}
if(c.playerRights == 3) {
c.gfx0(1555);
c.forcedText = “I OWN THIS JOINT NIGGERS!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(”"+Config.SERVER_NAME+" OWNER!!");
}
if(c.playerRights == 1) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I Keep Peace Around Here!!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“Moderator”);
}
if(c.playerRights == 4) {
c.startAnimation(4117);
c.forcedText = “I’m A Money Man!”;
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.sendMessage(“Donator”);
}
}
if (playerCommand.startsWith("/") && playerCommand.length() > 1) {
if (c.clanId >= 0) {
System.out.println(playerCommand);
playerCommand = playerCommand.substring(1);
Server.clanChat.playerMessageToClan(c.playerId, playerCommand, c.clanId);
} else {
if (c.clanId != -1)
c.clanId = -1;
c.sendMessage(“You are not in a clan.”);
}
return;
}
if (Config.SERVER_DEBUG)
Misc.println(c.playerName+" playerCommand: "+playerCommand);

if (c.playerRights >= 0)
    playerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3)
    moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 3)
    administratorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 3 || c.playerRights == 2)
    ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 3)
    ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 3)
    ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.isDonator == 1)
    DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
                   
}[/code]

I am just going to assume, you fall under 2 of the ranks. (on top of the processPacket call)

Your admin commands go in administratorCommands ONLY
your owner commands go in ownerCommands ONLY
Same for donor,player,etc.
The whole PI system is fucked up for commands :\ at least yours is…

Read full topic
